title: AdvisorMapping Table
description: Links financial advisors to their respective policy applications.
content:
Schema:
CREATE TABLE AdvisorMapping(AdvisorID VARCHAR(50), SubmissionID VARCHAR(50), AdvisorName VARCHAR(100), Region VARCHAR(100), OfficeCode VARCHAR(50));

Columns:
AdvisorID - Unique identifier for advisor
SubmissionID - Links to SubmissionLog
AdvisorName - Full name of advisor
Region - Advisor's operating region
OfficeCode - Internal office mapping code

Column Categories:
Region - 'North', 'South', 'East', 'West'
OfficeCode - 'OFFC01', 'OFFC02', 'OFFC03'

Sample Data:
{
  "AdvisorID": "ADV001",
  "SubmissionID": "SUB1001",
  "AdvisorName": "Jane Doe",
  "Region": "West",
  "OfficeCode": "OFFC01"
}

Business Context:
Each submission is assigned an advisor for tracking attribution and commissions.

Category: OPERATIONS

title: SubmissionLog Table
description: Tracks the lifecycle and decision status of application submissions.
content:
Schema:
CREATE TABLE SubmissionLog(SubmissionID VARCHAR(50), DecisionStatus VARCHAR(50), IsAccelerated BOOLEAN, SubmittedOn DATE, IsFlagged BOOLEAN, DecisionDate DATE, OfficeCode VARCHAR(50));

Columns:
SubmissionID - Unique application submission identifier
DecisionStatus - Status such as Approved, Rejected
IsAccelerated - True if instant underwriting
SubmittedOn - Date of submission
DecisionDate - Final decision date

Column Categories:
DecisionStatus - 'Approved', 'Rejected', 'Pending'
IsAccelerated - TRUE/FALSE

Sample Data:
{
  "SubmissionID": "SUB1001",
  "DecisionStatus": "Approved",
  "IsAccelerated": true,
  "SubmittedOn": "2025-06-15",
  "IsFlagged": false,
  "DecisionDate": "2025-06-20",
  "OfficeCode": "OFFC01"
}

Business Context:
This is the core audit and tracking table for submissions.

Category: AUDIT

title: PolicyCatalog Table
description: Contains master data about policy offerings and requested coverage.
content:
Schema:
CREATE TABLE PolicyCatalog(SubmissionID VARCHAR(50), PolicyCode VARCHAR(50), PolicyName VARCHAR(100), DurationMonths INT, AnnualPremium DECIMAL(10,2), ProductSegment VARCHAR(50), ChannelSource VARCHAR(50), PlanType VARCHAR(5), CoverageAmount DECIMAL(10,2));

Columns:
PolicyCode - Unique policy identifier
PolicyName - Marketing name of product
DurationMonths - Policy term in months
PlanType - S = Standard, P = Premium

Column Categories:
ChannelSource - 'Direct', 'Advisor', 'Online'
PlanType - 'S', 'P'

Sample Data:
{
  "SubmissionID": "SUB1001",
  "PolicyCode": "POL202",
  "PolicyName": "Smart Life Plan",
  "DurationMonths": 240,
  "AnnualPremium": 15000.0,
  "ProductSegment": "Life",
  "ChannelSource": "Direct",
  "PlanType": "S",
  "CoverageAmount": 1000000.0
}

Business Context:
Used to cross-check what was sold and what was underwritten.

Category: DATAWAREHOUSE

title: SalesLedger Table
description: Logs finalized sales and commission payouts for issued policies.
content:
Schema:
CREATE TABLE SalesLedger(SubmissionID VARCHAR(50), IssueDate DATE, RevenueRecognized DECIMAL(10,2), DistributionChannel VARCHAR(50), PlanType VARCHAR(5), AdvisorPayout DECIMAL(10,2));

Columns:
RevenueRecognized - Annual premium booked
AdvisorPayout - Commission paid to advisor

Column Categories:
DistributionChannel - 'Advisor', 'Online'
PlanType - 'S', 'P'

Sample Data:
{
  "SubmissionID": "SUB1001",
  "IssueDate": "2025-06-25",
  "RevenueRecognized": 15000.0,
  "DistributionChannel": "Advisor",
  "PlanType": "S",
  "AdvisorPayout": 1200.0
}

Business Context:
Used for revenue reporting and advisor compensation calculation.

Category: FINANCE

title: ClientRegistry Table
description: Maintains client profiles and key demographic information.
content:
Schema:
CREATE TABLE ClientRegistry(SubmissionID VARCHAR(50), FullName VARCHAR(100), DateOfBirth DATE, Gender VARCHAR(10), ResidentialState VARCHAR(50), Age INT, CivilStatus VARCHAR(20));

Columns:
FullName - Legal name of client
DateOfBirth - Used to calculate age and determine eligibility
CivilStatus - Relationship status

Column Categories:
Gender - 'M', 'F'
CivilStatus - 'Single', 'Married', 'Divorced'

Sample Data:
{
  "SubmissionID": "SUB1001",
  "FullName": "Amit Sharma",
  "DateOfBirth": "1985-09-10",
  "Gender": "M",
  "ResidentialState": "Maharashtra",
  "Age": 39,
  "CivilStatus": "Married"
}

Business Context:
Serves as the golden source for applicant identity and segmentation.

Category: MASTERDATA

title: RiskEvaluation Table
description: Captures risk assessments and final underwriting outcomes.
content:
Schema:
CREATE TABLE RiskEvaluation(SubmissionID VARCHAR(50), EvaluationStatus VARCHAR(50), RiskCategory VARCHAR(20), MedicalsRequired BOOLEAN, EvaluationDate DATE, EvaluatorID VARCHAR(50));

Columns:
EvaluationStatus - Accepted or Declined
RiskCategory - Underwriting outcome like Preferred, Standard
MedicalsRequired - Whether medical tests were needed

Column Categories:
RiskCategory - 'Preferred', 'Standard', 'Substandard'
EvaluationStatus - 'Accepted', 'Declined'

Sample Data:
{
  "SubmissionID": "SUB1001",
  "EvaluationStatus": "Accepted",
  "RiskCategory": "Standard",
  "MedicalsRequired": false,
  "EvaluationDate": "2025-06-18",
  "EvaluatorID": "UW983"
}

Business Context:
Used by underwriting team and models to validate decision outcomes.

Category: UNDERWRITING
